__e: How 'bout we make some hot coa and watch a movie?
And I've got hot chocolate and everything you could want.
Yeah, but you put them up with your family. You have some cocoa, and you-- you don't have a family.
Now more like you just came in from playing in the snow, but you haven't had your hot chocolate yet.
I didn't say I'd give you a kiss. I said I'd get you a hot chocolate, okay?
You know, who would have thought that when Ma was choosing her room, we'd be standing here sipping hot cocoa, listening to the sounds of her coming?
It's my candy bar, and I'll do what I want with it.
But a kid came to his house selling chocolate bars and walked in on him in his mom's dress.
I just think that the makeup is a little bit, um... shellacked.
Of course I have some chocolate for you.
I didn't have nothing to do with -- did you use that box of chocolates to take them off their guard?
Could I have some chocolate, please?
